document.full_text: secret police raided homes near damascus overnight, rights campaigners said on sunday, as popular opposition to authoritarian president bashar al-assad mounted following the bloodiest attacks on pro-democracy protesters.
document.title: syrian forces raid homes as assad opposition mounts
lines_and_colors: secret police raided homes near damascus overnight, rights campaigners said on sunday, as popular opposition to authoritarian president bashar al-assad mounted following the bloodiest attacks on pro-democracy protesters.
